idea-plugin.name: Extra ToolWindow Colorful Icons
idea-plugin.description:
Makes tool window icons colorful. This plugin is based on the ToolWindow Colorful Icons plugin, and adds some icons. You can also choose icons to (de)activate: see Settings > Appearance & Behavior > Extra ToolWindow Colorful Icons.
If you find this plugin helpful, you can buy me a coffee. Thank you! üëç

See changelog and readme on GitHub. Check also my plugins.
